data.text:
Who is Jay-Z's brother? Notorious rapper and entrepreneur Jay-Z has a younger brother named Eric Marlon Carter, known professionally as Eric Carter.

Eric Carter was born in Brooklyn, New York, on May 4, 1974. He is a rapper, songwriter, and record producer. He is best known for his work with the hip hop group U.N.L.V. (Unlimited Neverlasting Verses), which he formed with his brother Jay-Z in the early 1990s. Eric Carter has also released several solo albums, including "Empire State of Mind" (2006) and "The Renaissance" (2011).

Eric Carter is a talented rapper and producer who has made a significant contribution to the hip hop genre. He is a close collaborator with his brother Jay-Z, and the two have worked together on numerous projects over the years.

In addition to his music career, Eric Carter is also a successful entrepreneur. He is the co-founder of the clothing line Rocawear and the record label Roc-A-Fella Records. He is also a partner in the sports agency Roc Nation Sports.

Eric Carter is a multi-talented artist and businessman who has achieved great success in both fields. He is a role model for aspiring rappers and entrepreneurs alike.

Who is Jay-Z's Brother?

Eric Carter has also released several solo albums, including "Empire State of Mind" (2006) and "The Renaissance" (2011).
